verses.verse: Who <WH4310> has believed <WH539> our message <WH8052>? And to whom <WH4310> has the arm <WH2220> of the Lord <WH3068> been revealed <WH1540>?

For He grew <WH5927> up before <WH6440> Him like a tender <WH3126> shoot, <WH3126> And like a root <WH8328> out of parched <WH6723> ground; <WH776> He has no <WH3808> [stately] form <WH8389> or majesty <WH1926> That we should look <WH7200> upon Him, Nor <WH3808> appearance <WH4758> that we should be attracted <WH2530> to Him.

He was despised <WH959> and forsaken <WH2310> of men, <WH376> A man <WH376> of sorrows, <WH4341> and acquainted <WH3045> with grief; <WH2483> And like one from whom men hide <WH4564> their face, <WH6440> He was despised, <WH959> and we did not esteem <WH2803> Him.

Surely <WH403> our griefs <WH2483> He Himself <WH1931> bore, <WH5375> And our sorrows <WH4341> He carried; <WH5445> Yet we ourselves <WH587> esteemed <WH2803> Him stricken, <WH5060> Smitten <WH5221> of God, <WH430> and afflicted. <WH6031>

But He was pierced <WH9135> through <WH9135> for our transgressions, <WH6588> He was crushed <WH1792> for our iniquities; <WH5771> The chastening <WH4148> for our well-being [fell] upon Him, And by His scourging <WH2250> we are healed. <WH7495>

All <WH3605> of us like sheep <WH6629> have gone <WH8582> astray, <WH8582> Each <WH376> of us has turned <WH6437> to his own way; <WH1870> But the Lord <WH3068> has caused the iniquity <WH5771> of us all <WH3605> To fall <WH6293> on Him.

He was oppressed <WH5065> and He was afflicted, <WH6031> Yet He did not open <WH6605> His mouth; <WH6310> Like a lamb <WH7716> that is led <WH2986> to slaughter, <WH2874> And like a sheep <WH7353> that is silent <WH481> before <WH6440> its shearers, <WH1494> So He did not open <WH6605> His mouth. <WH6310>

By oppression <WH6115> and judgment <WH4941> He was taken <WH3947> away; And as for His generation, <WH1755> who <WH4310> considered <WH7878> That He was cut <WH1504> off <WH1504> out of the land <WH776> of the living, <WH2416> For the transgression <WH6588> of my people <WH5971> to whom the stroke <WH5061> [was due?]

His grave <WH6913> was assigned <WH5414> with wicked <WH7563> men, <WH7563> Yet He was with a rich <WH6223> man <WH6223> in His death, <WH4194> Because <WH5921> He had done <WH6213> no <WH3808> violence, <WH2555> Nor <WH3808> was there any deceit <WH4820> in His mouth. <WH6310>

But the Lord <WH3068> was pleased <WH2654> To crush <WH1792> Him, putting <WH2470> [Him] to grief; <WH2470> If <WH518> He would render <WH7760> Himself <WH5315> [as] a guilt <WH817> offering, <WH817> He will see <WH7200> [His] offspring, <WH2233> He will prolong <WH748> [His] days, <WH3117> And the good <WH2656> pleasure <WH2656> of the Lord <WH3068> will prosper <WH6743> in His hand. <WH3027>

As a result <WH4480> of the anguish <WH5999> of His soul, <WH5315> He will see <WH7200> [it] and be satisfied; <WH7646> By His knowledge <WH1847> the Righteous <WH6662> One, <WH6662> My Servant, <WH5650> will justify <WH6663> the many, <WH7227> As He will bear <WH5445> their iniquities. <WH5771>

Therefore, <WH3651> I will allot <WH2505> Him a portion <WH2505> with the great, <WH7227> And He will divide <WH2505> the booty <WH7998> with the strong; <WH6099> Because <WH8478> <WH834> He poured <WH6168> out Himself <WH5315> to death, <WH4194> And was numbered <WH4487> with the transgressors; <WH6586> Yet He Himself <WH1931> bore <WH5375> the sin <WH2399> of many, <WH7227> And interceded <WH6293> for the transgressors. <WH6586>
